body.name: GPS Navigation for Car, Latest 2023 Map,7 inch Touch Screen Real Voice Spoken Turn-by-Turn Direction Reminding Navigation System for Cars, Vehicle GPS Satellite Navigator with
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 1 min
features: 【Practical GPS Navigation】Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time.

【Car GPS Function】①Support Postcode, Address, Coordinates, Favorite and POI Search. ②4 Routes Options: Fast/Green/Short/Easy. ③Support GPS time or Map time setting. ④Support FM broadcast, but FM not mean FM radio, just for transferring the gps sound to your car.⑤Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time ( real voice announcement)

【Custom settings】 You can customize a better route according to your vehicle’s weight, length, height and width, thus avoiding the roads which have width restrictions or height restriction or weight restriction, etc. Supports 7 vehicle type: Car, Truck, Bus, Taxi, Emergency, Bicycle, Pedestrian.

【Lifetime Map Updated for Free】 Pre-installed with the most up-to-date 2023 maps, including: United States, Canada, Mexico. And you can contact us to download the map of Europe.(Such as,Britain, Germany, Spain, Italy, France, etc. ) Life time free maps update, please feel free to contact us to update.

【What You Get】 ①GPS Navigation with CE & RoHs Certificate ②Car Charger ③USB Cable ④Suction Cup Mount ⑤Back Bracket ⑥User Manual. (Common questions and operates are in user manual, please read it carefully before or while you use your navigation. If you need further help, please feel free to contact us. )
body.description: Please read before using: The USB cable is NOT for charging, ONLY for connection with Computer. If you have issues with power on the GPS by the USB cable, please use the car charging adapter to charge the GPS for 10 minutes first

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, colorful and fast GPS
reviews.reviewText: I was a little curious as to how a Chinese manufactured GPS system would function, and whether it would be aggravating to use on the roads of Southern New Jersey. I purchased it because of the size of the display and the affordable price, and use it on sales calls during the business week.I have been very pleased with its performance. It has a large, colorful display. The navigation within the GPS is clear and quick. The display always shows the direction vertically, something my old Tom-Tom did not do that occasionally caused confusion when several quick turns were required in succession. The street graphics are clear, road labels are clear and the GPS gives you plenty of warning regarding turns.It also has predictive address entering. By that I mean it will narrow the choices depending on what you enter. So if you enter a township, it will reduce the number of options with each letter you enter. I typically enter only three or four letters for town and street before it pops up the one I am looking for. Saves a lot of time.My only criticism is a relatively minor one. The estimate it provides for the amount of time to reach your destination is sometimes off. Initially it will sometimes overesimate how long the trip will take. It corrects itself as you move closer to your destination, but that can be a little disconcerting at first.Overall, I recommend this GPS for both business and casual travelers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: This is a great value. Easy to set up and easy to use. The 7 inch screen is a great size and is nice and bright and easy on your eyes. I have been using for the past few weeks and it is definitely a game changer. This will help you find your destination with ease. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars User Friendly and clear even for a beginner
reviews.reviewText: Good evening,I recently bought this GPS navigation for my husband. I surprised him with it because he would not want it otherwise, reason being because I knew he would feel that it would be hard to navigate. Well I ordered and gave it to him and although was very appreciative! He resisted for a couple of week before he tried it out. Well I happy to say He loves it! This is a fantastic Navigation system, very user friendly, large screen and display super easy to navigate. all in all a great choice.Sincere Thanks,Adelina Lupinacci

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We travel often using MAPS on our iPhone 14. Our 2015 Subaru Forester does not have on board navigation; this was to be a nice addition. The product looked great and has a nice mounting system. The power cord was nice with a robust plug for the lighter socket.On our Recent trip to Charlotte, NC , I had a difficult time entering our destination. In fact, it did not recognize the address I tried to enter. The interface is cumbersome. It is not at all intuitive which is exacerbated by very poor operating instructions. The supplied sun shield was akin to working a puzzle as there are no instructions. and was very flimsy.We ended up using our phones for the trip. I returned it to Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and quick startup
reviews.reviewText: This GPS has been great and very effective to help me get out of difficult areas or if my phone dies. I’ve had issues with my phone before and this device really came through for me and helped me out. I recommend this over other overly expensive GPS devices. The interface is easy to use and very clear. The startup is quick and you already have no time to wait when plugging in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No significant issues with this product. I recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item for a elderly man almost 80. I needed something easy to operate as his use and knowledge is limited for electronics. After setting it up and adding his home address I placed the unit in easy mode. I also purchased a hard case so he could leave it in his glove box. I showed him how to use it. Once he turns the unit on it only takes two buttons to get him home. He has a tendency to forget where he's at and how to get home. He used it the other day for the first time and told me the thing talked him all the way home. What an inexpensive investment for allowing someone to keep their independence.
